combatSkills.name: Frozen Ascendance
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Ultra Water M.Attack Dmg.+70% per each [Self] Water Attack Dmg. Buff Skill and [Foe] removes Str. & Mag. Buffs exc. Assist Skills

combatSkills.name: Frozen Orb
combatSkills.description: [Self] Fast Increase S.A Gauge Charge Gain and Water Attack Dmg.+100%/4 turns & [Self] +3 Actions (Lo Water M.Attack a Foe)

combatSkills.name: Piercing Chill
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Slow Super Water M.Attack w/temp Mag. Boost and Hi Critical Rate & [Self] Critical Rate and Penetration Rate+50%/1 turn

combatSkills.name: Diamond Lance
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Hi Water M.Attack w/Hi Unguard Rate & [Self] Mag. and Dex.+50%/3 turns

passiveSkills.name: Water Manifestation
passiveSkills.description: Fire Resist+35%. When countering and attacking, regular M.Attack a Foe with Water Element
